pages.text: The Duplication Grenade can be used to create a short-lived illusion that appears identical to the player that threw it.$(br)Can usually redirect mob hostility from the player to the duplicate.

$(p)It is obtained by using a $(l:resources/quartz_sphere)Quartz Sphere$(/l) on a $(l:artifacts/devices/mirror)Mirror$(/l) at the cost of $(item)2000$() $(l:altar/altar)Altar Power$(/l), and it will be bound to the player who created it. When the illusion ends or dies, a Quartz Sphere will drop in its place.
